text:
So I think you workers are not on project `partest` and thus are not seeing that package. Workawound: Setting an environment variable calles `JULIA_PROJECT` before launching the workers, or activating the project manually in all of them:

```using Distributed
using GLM   # works
addprocs(3)
@everywhere
  using Pkg; Pkg.activate("./partest")  # required
  using GLM
end```
Checkout: <https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/issues/28781>
